Package io.github.rowak.nanoleafapi.event

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    NanoleafEventListener
    A listener for listening to events from a Nanoleaf device.
    NanoleafTouchEventListener
    A listener for listening to low-latency touch events from a Nanoleaf device.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DetailedTouchEvent
    Detailed touch events are received from low-latency touch event streaming.
    EffectsEvent
    Listens for changes to either the effect currently being displayed, or changes to the effects installed on the Nanoleaf device.
    Event
    Events are received from Nanoleaf devices when certain events occur.
    LayoutEvent
    Listens for changes to the physical layout of the Nanoleaf panels.
    StateEvent
    Listens for changes to the state of the Nanoleaf device, such as changes in brightness.
    TouchEvent
    Listens for physical interactions with the Nanoleaf panels, such as single/double taps and swipes.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    EventType
    The general classes of events that separate the different functions of Nanoleaf devices.
